response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This product holds immense value to us, but considering its significance to you, we believe it's time to share this masterpiece with someone who appreciates it as much as we do. We are offering the product to you for $1,350,000, which we believe strikes a fair balance between reflecting its true worth and making it accessible to you. We are confident that this investment will not only enrich your collection but also provide substantial returns over time. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 1350000}
